column5: Morning started with some of our feather friends.     Then it was some time near the water. Ice was blown in over night and the winter kill was very min. Also some nice morning shots of the marina.            I did take cuddles for a walk aswell.    I didnt take any shots of the driving range we hit today,as I did not want to offend anyone After that is was a skate comp for the young one,well he still is young   . Great to see so many young fellas competing and having a great time.        And last but not least,Grandma and mother to be.    Thanks for looking.  Poppy Brian
Nice pics "Poppy"...love the one with the sun coming through the clouds near the tree and it's reflection in the water...very puuuurrdy.
Hey Pop,  Don't miss when that big ole tom walks out in front of ya.....  Looks like your in for some action!!  Sinker
Poppy Brian, that sounds great.  Thanks for the shots, that's a nice place you live in.
Hey "Poppy" Brian, Hope you don't mind, but I saved #7. That is a beautiful shot! Thanks for sharing your day!

Hey Sink there is a huge one there aswell. He walked in like he owned the yard,the shot didnt turn out very good so I didnt post it.  Thanks for the comments on that 7th pic. I cant understand why my camera can take great pics at times and crap ones like the turkey ones. Guess Im going to have to finally invest in a new one.  Hey Mr.B,Nice to hear from ya bud,hope alls well.
Brian... my guess is the digital zoom...  by that I mean in your other shots your using your cameras optical zoom... in those long range turkey pics your into digital (Crap) zoom.  G
